DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Ginsenoside Rg3 Combination With First-line Chemotherapy Advanced Gastric Cancer
DOC.criteria: 1 . Signed informed consent form 2 . Performance Status Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) 01 ; 3 . Histologically cytologically confirm gastric cancer ; 4 . At least one measurable disease ( accord RECIST , Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ) 5 . Life expectancy least 3 month ; 1 . Received prior treatment include Ginsenoside Rg3 ; 2 . Active uncontrolled infection ; 3 . Concurrent treatment investigational agent participation another therapeutic clinical trial ; 4 . Pregnant lactating woman .
